title: Championship Ashe border. after the event ends.
body: if you get the border for Championship Ashe, and later after the event ends for example. and you got the skin from a... re-roll, so if you unlock the skin, will you be able to use the border? i'm just wondering if i should get the icon

replies.body: i have loading border and icons from event of riven vs yasuo  i am stil waiting money for get the both of skins
Additional features like borders or chromas already unlocked should remain on your account, so it would still be there if you obtained the actual skin later on.
oh thank you very much, i appreciate it!
